title: Ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing a lightweight, extensible framework for running large language models locally.
highlights: Run Llama 3, Phi 3, Mistral, Gemma and others

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client library for integrating Ollama models into Node.js and browser apps.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip-installable wrapper around the Ollama REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLM, chat or embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that connects to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, offering synchronous & asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API for Ruby and Rails projects.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built Go CLI that wraps Ollama commands for easier scripting and automation.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as an AI coding assistant.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling Ollama models as generators or embedders in NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama containerized with GPU support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and GPU nodes.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C# / .NET client for Ollama with async/await and streaming support.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: Lightweight VS Code extension for chatting with local Ollama models inside the editor.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed, async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query local Ollama models for note summarization and Q&A.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Python Slack bot using Ollama to answer questions in channels or DMs without leaving Slack.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to Ollama for interactive local LLM demos.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings for Ollama.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Python developers to interact with Ollama servers.
